testcase.classname: US_0001_User cant place a successful new buy order with invalid nonce and invalid client_order_id credentials
testcase.name: TC_0002_user places a successful order than fails to attemp another order with the old nonce
testcase.system-out: Given user enters new order fixed valid datas...............................passed Then user enters a valid APIKey "apikey"....................................passed Then user enters a valid symbol "btcusd"....................................passed Then user enters a valid nonce 0............................................passed Then user enters a valid client order id "".................................passed Then user enters a valid amount "17"........................................passed Then user enters a valid min_amount "8".....................................passed Then user enters a valid price "13650"......................................passed Then user enters a valid side "buy".........................................passed Then user enters a valid type "exchange limit"..............................passed Then user enters a valid option "immediate-or-cancel".......................passed Then user enters a valid accountname "primary"..............................passed Then user enters a valid APISecret "apisecret"..............................passed Then system creates payload and signatures..................................passed When user posts the new buy order request...................................passed Then user verifies status code is 200.......................................passed Then user enters a valid client order id "".................................passed Then system creates payload and signatures..................................passed When user posts the new buy order request...................................passed Then user verifies status code is 400, reason is "InvalidNonce" and message is "has not increased".passed
